name: Flip! (PurpleFlourish)
description:
Hi! Welcome to the world of Flip. My first semi-big project, this game was made in the context of a college session game project. We all worked as a team to put together code and assets together as I learned the basics of Unity along with pixelart. The style was heavily inspired by hyper light drifter, wich was our reference for base gameplay aswell.

If this project piqued your interest, be sure to visit my twitter at @Purple_Flourish as I'll be posting new  projects along the way!
